text.name: sys_description
text.text: Were you at the time, according to you, the best in the schoolyard at Mega Drive or SNES games? Do you finally want to prove it? Today, thanks to emulation, we can re-play our old games and, as was the case for the first time on XBOX 360, obtain achievements and badges. Your progress is thus posted online in real time so that your friends can follow it. So you will have to try to complete all your favorite classics at 100% to compete with them. May the best win!
